name: Babyelephant Simulator
description:
You play a little baby elephant who’s goal it is to prevent CoVid from spreading. Different types of of Task needs to be performed to keep the population safe. The elephant needs to enforce social distancing between people by ramming into them. Furthermore you have different types of people who need to be treated differently. For example: Chin-Wearers, Anti-Maskers, Conspiracy Theorists and the fearsome KAREN. Your tools to defeat those individuals are: Mask that you can force one into their face, disinfectants to prevent CoVid from spreading, trapping people in a "Lockdown" cell, enforce social distancing by ramming etc. There could be more difficulty levels in which the Virus is more infective and enemies spawn more frequent and in greater numbers.

Controls:

"W, A, S, D" to move
"Shift" to sprint
"Q" to rotate

Winning Condition:

Not implemented yet, but stop covid from spreading by raming into anti-maskers

Known Issues:

everything
